attributes.action: Stop them petitioning for a 2nd vote as Leave has already won, get over it!
attributes.additional_details: 52% to 48% is still a win! If a sport like football is played & it's 5-4 to one side then the team with the highest score wins, the other team don't get to replay the game just because they don't like the outcome!
attributes.background: We had a democratic vote and it was won fairly by The Leave Campaign & all its supporters so we don't need a second vote as it would be a waste of money, time & effort!
